actions.name: Greataxe
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target.

abilities.name: Aggressive
abilities.description: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target.

abilities.name: Aggressive
abilities.description: As a bonus action, the orog can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

abilities.name: Multiattack
abilities.description: The orog makes two greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.

abilities.name: Chameleon Skin
abilities.description: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn.

abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
abilities.description: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

abilities.name: Multiattack
abilities.description: The troglodyte makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Blood Drain
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. The stirge attaches to the creature and doesn't attack, instead draining (1d4+3) HP each turn. After draining 10 HP or the target dies, it detatches by spending 5 ft of movement. A creature can detatch it manually after using an action.

actions.name: Spear
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target.

abilities.name: Aggressive
abilities.description: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

abilities.name: Gruumsh's Fury
abilities.description: The orc deals an extra 4(1d8) damage when it hits with a weapon attack.

abilities.name: Spellcasting
abilities.description: The orc is a 3rd level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The orc has the following cleric spells prepared:

abilities.name: Cantrips (at-will)
abilities.description: Guidance, resistance, thaumaturgy

abilities.name: 1st level (4 slots)
abilities.description: Bless, command

abilities.name: 2nd level (2 slots)
abilities.description: Augury, spiritual weapon (spear)

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone

abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
abilities.description: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.description: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. The target is grappled with escape DC 15. Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the lizard can't bite another target.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not grappled by the lizard. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature the lizard is grappling. The target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the lizard, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the lizard turns. The lizard can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the lizard dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting prone.

abilities.name: Multiattack
abilities.description: The lizard makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. One attack can be replaced by Swallow.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.

actions.name: Beak
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.

abilities.name: Multiattack
abilities.description: The grick makes one attack with its tentacles. If that attack hits, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.

abilities.name: Stone Camouflage
abilities.description: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

abilities.name: Amorphous
abilities.description: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

abilities.name: Corrode Metal
abilities.description: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits this ooze corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the ooze is destroyed after dealing damage.

abilities.name: False Appearance
abilities.description: While the ooze remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an oily pool or wet rock.
